dt: {bc}to make a prolonged grating or squeaking sound often as a result of being worn-out
{bc}to proceed slowly with or as if with {a_link|creaking} wheels

dt.t: the story {wi}creaks{/wi} along to a dull conclusion

et: Middle English {it}creken{/it} to croak, of imitative origin
shortdef: to make a prolonged grating or squeaking sound often as a result of being worn-out; also : to proceed slowly with or as if with creaking wheels
